name: Hug Quest Version 0.1
description:
The goal of this game is to find your friend (or your cat, in single-player mode) and hug them.

This is a proof of concept: It turns out that randomly generating mazes that must be solvable from every point, and by two people, has a really limited fun factor, and I would rather focus on individually building levels with unique challenges and puzzles than continue trying to add random obstacles.

This is a side project, and may not be complete for a long while.
